NamedSoftgoal - Class in bdi4jade.goal

notifyBeliefBases(BeliefEvent) - Method in class bdi4jade.belief.AbstractBelief
Notifies the belief bases with which this belief is associated that the value of this belief has changed.
notifyBeliefChanged(BeliefEvent) - Method in class bdi4jade.belief.BeliefBase
Notifies the capability associated with this belief base that a belief was modified.
nullBeliefValueGoal(String) - Static method in class bdi4jade.goal.GoalTemplateFactory
This method creates a goal template that positively matches a goal if it is of the type BeliefValueGoal, has the given belief name, and is associated with a null value.
